children.stringValue:
r: reset control element to default value
ctrl + c: copy from (single value or folder)
ctrl + v: paste to (single value or folder)
these hotkeys cannot be turned off for now

- autosave triggers on graceful sketch exit
- save guard blocks autosave in unresponsive sketches
- unresponsive meaning it took longer than 
   'save guard (ms)' to render the last frame
